user_query: I am planning a surprise birthday party for my best friend. Can you suggest some unique party themes and decoration ideas? Additionally, find me a good bakery to order a customized cake.

TaskList.description: Research and compile a list of unique party themes and decoration ideas.
Find local bakeries that offer customized cakes and compare their options.
Synthesize the information from subtasks 1 and 2 to create a comprehensive party plan.
